mapper.select: SELECT B_NO,TTL,CONTENT,B_ST_CODE,WR_DATE,HITS, NVL(FILE_NO,-1) FILE_NO FROM BOARD ORDER BY b_no DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT b_no, ttl, content, wr_date, hits ,NVL(file_no,-1) file_no, LAG(b_no,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY b_no) AS PREBNO,LAG(ttl,1,null) OVER(ORDER BY b_no) AS PREBTTL, LEAD(b_no,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY b_no) AS NEXTBNO, LEAD(ttl,1,null) OVER(ORDER BY b_no) AS NEXTBTTl FROM BOARD ) WHERE b_no = #{bNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET HITS = NVL(HITS,0) +1 WHERE B_NO= #{bNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, W.* FROM ( SELECT B_NO, TTL, CONTENT, WR_DATE, HITS ,NVL(FILE_NO,-1) FILE_NO, B_ST_CODE ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS LENGTH FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND ( TTL LIKE '%' || #{mix} || '%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{mix} || '%')
AND TTL LIKE '%' || #{ttl} || '%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'
AND TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < WR_DATE
AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > WR_DATE
ORDER BY B_NO DESC) W )
WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(B_NO),0)+1 FROM BOARD
insert into board (b_no,ttl,content,wr_date,B_ST_CODE,file_no) values(#{bNo},#{ttl},#{content},SYSDATE,'B01', #{fileNo} NULL )
